Literature.Title: Peptides With Triplet-Tryptophan-Pivot Promoted Pathogenic Bacteria Membrane Defects.
Literature.Author: Chou S, Li Q, Zaitseva N, Shang L, Li J, Wang Z, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:15% Hemolysis=64 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:30% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Escherichia coli UB1005(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0925(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0385(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 7469(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0911(MIC=>64µM),Lacticaseibacillus rhamnosus 1.0386(MIC=16µM),Lactiplantibacillus plantarum 8014(MIC=8µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(10-20% Killing=64µM)
